tool_description: Hey Developers, This is the API that helps you to get latest market and business News data.
name: Biz News API
title: Biz News API

api_list.name: Get  /news
api_list.description: It returns the **entire market related data** from the multiple resources.

api_list.name: GET /news/{source}
api_list.description: It returns the  news data based on the resource which you passed as a parameter at url.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://biz-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/business today"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "biz-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://biz-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{source}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "biz-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
